home-header: We help teams optimize their diversity to develop an inclusive and thriving workplace culture.
home-intro: Optimal Leadership provides interactive, thought-provoking trainings and coaching sessions to help teams and leaders tackle tough issues related to diversity and inclusion, belonging, leadership, anti-bias and allyship.
home-tagline: Lead the diverse, inclusive and thriving team you have always wanted.
bio: The key to this brand of leadership lies in awareness and growth. You see, the more you understand that team diversity is the ability to optimize different perspectives when making decisions, the more likely you are to attract and retain diverse talent. The more aware you are of racial and gender bias in your organization's systems and structures, the more likely you are to dismantle them and develop an inclusive workplace. The more you serve your team as a driver of their growth, the more they will thrive under your leadership.
A thriving team will always achieve the bottom line, but a diverse and inclusive team will exceed it.

I am all about awareness and growth. That's why I am committed to providing you with the resources you need to become a better leader for diverse teams. I am here to help you make the right changes to take your team or organization to the next level.
My name is Agatha and I am your partner in this journey. I want to help you fulfill your potential as a leader and as a team.
about-us: We provide in-person and virtual interactive workshops and consultations on diversity and inclusion to help leaders and teams show up as their best selves.

home-cards.text: Partner with our consultants to evaluate and improve the anti-bias and inclusivity of your hiring and promotion practices, retention strategies and overall work environment.

An immersive training course that is tailored to your organization’s needs. This event puts you face-to-face with our diversity and inclusion experts. Sign up to learn about how you and your team can ensure your workplace culture is a place of belonging, growth, and opportunity for everyone.
One-on-One coaching with Agatha on the principles of inclusive leadership. 3-minute daily coaching videos coming soon!

about-banner: We understand optimal leadership because we're defining it.
about-intro: Those we serve are at the center of our decisions. We believe servant leadership is necessary for team members to show up as their best selves. Representation matters when increasing the impact of our products and building trust. We believe diverse leadership and culture-building requires intentionality and follow-through to result in employee satisfaction and bottom-line success. A growth mindset provides a pathway to continuous improvement and high performance. We invest in talent development because it increases employee engagement and retention. People drive the culture of teams and organizations. We invest in personnel because – they’re worth it.

Our mission is to provide the world with diverse, high-performing teams and equitable and inclusive work environments where such teams can thrive. We are here because organizations need diverse leaders now more than ever. We develop and support teams and individuals in their quest for leadership development, recruitment and retention of diverse, high-performing teams and creation of equitable and inclusive work spaces.

We believe that servant leadership is necessary for team members to show up as their best selves. We know we must demographically represent those we serve by way of our staff and by being intentional about diversity, equity and inclusivity. We invest in the talent development of our teams because it drives high performance and helps to retain talent. We value intentional team culture management because the teams behind the projects are the pillars that hold up everything we do as an organization.
